name: XRPS
description: The XRC-20 protocol is not only an inscription protocol, it is also a bridge between real life and the digital world. XRC-20 will redefine the storage and interaction standards of gateways. Make engaging in the digital world as easy as sending an email. The Xrc20 protocol contains multiple standards that will redefine the user interaction process with Ripple, thereby simplifying operations for users.
